front.title: A Proposal to Incorporate ECN in MPLS

abstract.t: We propose the addition of ECN to MPLS switching. ECN enables end-end congestion control without necessarily depending on packet lossas the sole indicator of congestion. The proposal suggests having asingle bit in the MPLS header to indicate ECN, and simple signalingat the time of setting up the LSP (Label Switched Path) forindication of ECN capability. This allows for incorporation of ECN inMPLS in a coordinated manner with IP and also in a backwardscompatible fashion.
